data.title: James Newton Howard James Newton Howard & Friends - 180gm US Vinyl LP
data.meta_description: JAMES NEWTON HOWARD & Friends (Rare 1983 US 9-track audiophile LP recorded live direct to disk by the keyboard wizard responsible for many of today's finest film scores alongside his production & session work for the likes of Elton John, Rickie Lee Jones & Toto, complete with double sided card illustrated insert, picture sleeve. The sleeve shows just a little scuffing to the corners and the vinyl shows a few light signs of play LAB23) Tracklisting & Info: 01. Caesar 02. Gone Buttlefishin' 03. She 04. L'Daddy 05. Tandoori 06. Borealis 07. E Minor Shuffle 08. Slippin' Away II 09. Amuseum Year of Release - 1983 Format - vinyl LP album (LP record) Record Label - Sheffield Lab Catalogue No - LAB23 Country of Origin - USA Availability - In Stock

JAMES NEWTON HOWARD & Friends (Rare 1983 US 9-track audiophile LP recorded live direct to disk by the keyboard wizard responsible for many of today's finest film scores alongside his production & session work for the likes of Elton John, Rickie Lee Jones & Toto, complete with double sided card illustrated insert, picture sleeve. The sleeve shows just a little scuffing to the corners and the vinyl shows a few light signs of play LAB23)
